scripts.mocha:seed:test: npm run seed:test && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha --watch
scripts.mocha:seed:dev: npm run seed:dev && cross-env NODE_ENV=development mocha --exit
scripts.seed:dev: node test/utils.js -dev && npx sequelize-cli db:seed --seed 20220826162419-demo-user.js 20220917224907-test-product.js 20220917230626-test-wishlist.js 20220924192533-test-reviews.js 20220929190113-test-cart.js  20220929190057-test-cartItem.js 20221013125753-test-orders.js --env development
scripts.seed:test: node test/utils.js -test && npx sequelize-cli db:seed --seed 20220917221820-test-user.js 20220917224907-test-product.js 20220917230626-test-wishlist.js 20220924192533-test-reviews.js 20220929190113-test-cart.js  20220929190057-test-cartItem.js 20221013125753-test-orders.js --env test
